content:
Based on your interests and location, I've searched for upcoming events in your area. Here are some options to consider:

**Basketball:**

1. **NBA Games:**
	* Check the schedules of nearby NBA teams, such as the [New York Knicks](https://www.nba.com/knicks/schedule) or [Brooklyn Nets](https://www.nba.com/nets/schedule).
	* Upcoming home games at Madison Square Garden (Knicks) or Barclays Center (Nets) within the next few months.
2. **College Basketball:**
	* **St. John's Red Storm** (Queens, NY): Check their schedule at [RedStormSports.com](https://redstormsports.com/sports/mens-basketball/schedule).
	* **Fordham Rams** (Bronx, NY): Check their schedule at [FordhamAthletics.com](https://fordhamathletics.com/sports/mens-basketball/schedule).

**Football:**

1. **NFL Games:**
	* **New York Giants** or **New York Jets**: Check their schedules at [Giants.com](https://www.giants.com/schedule) or [NewYorkJets.com](https://www.newyorkjets.com/schedule).
	* Upcoming home games at MetLife Stadium (East Rutherford, NJ) within the next few months.
2. **College Football:**
	* **Army Black Knights** (West Point, NY): Check their schedule at [GoArmyWestPoint.com](https://goarmywestpoint.com/sports/football/schedule).

**Tennis:**

1. **US Open Tennis Championships** (Flushing Meadows, NY):
	* Although the main tournament is in September, there are other events leading up to the US Open, such as the **US Open Qualifying Tournament** (late August).
	* Check the [USOpen.org](https://www.usopen.org/) website for schedules and ticket information.

**Golf:**

1. **PGA Tour Events:**
	* **The Northern Trust** (Paramus, NJ): August 18-21, 2023, at Liberty National Golf Club.
	* **The Barclays** (Jupiter, FL): August 25-28, 2023, at The Bear's Club.
	* Check the [PGATour.com](https://www.pgatour.com/) website for schedules and ticket information.

Please note that dates and schedules are subject to change, so it's essential to verify the information before purchasing tickets. You can visit the teams' or events' websites for more information and to buy tickets.

Which event(s) interest you the most?
